description: This HTML file serves as the frontend interface for a database visualizer web application. It includes structural markup, inline CSS styles, and embedded JavaScript for dynamic interactions such as loading database list, tables, and data, as well as handling user actions like refreshing, expanding data cells, and selecting databases and tables.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of available databases from the backend API and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, resets current selections, and updates the UI accordingly.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Handles expansion and collapse of database items, loads tables for selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and renders data for the selected table, limited to 50 records.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML to display tabular data with header and rows.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Prepares individual cell content based on value type, including handling long strings and objects.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content to show full data or truncated preview.
